scripts.prepublish: mkdir -p dist && browserify -r rdf-ext > dist/rdf-ext.js &&  browserify --external rdf-ext -d js/rdf2h-core.js js/logger.js > dist/rdf2h.js && cp node_modules/rdf-parser-n3-browser/dist/n3-parser.js dist/n3-parser.js && cp node_modules/rdf-store-ldp-browser/dist/rdf-store-ldp.js dist/rdf-store-ldp.js
